mapper.select: SELECT Date , sum(CASE WHEN age = 1 THEN Spend END) 'age_20' , sum(CASE WHEN age = 2 THEN Spend END) 'age_30' , sum(CASE WHEN age = 3 THEN Spend END) 'age_40' , sum(CASE WHEN age = 4 THEN Spend END) 'age_50' , sum(CASE WHEN age = 5 THEN Spend END) 'age_60' FROM test_predict_age_spend2 GROUP BY date

select Sex,BusinessType as Category, sum(TotalPayment) as Spend from (SELECT Sex, (CASE WHEN BusinessType in ('광학제품', '기타', '회원제형태') THEN '기타' WHEN BusinessType in ('의류', '신변잡화', '자동차 판매', '주방용구', '연료판매', '건축자제', '가구', '사무통신', '직물', '전기제품') THEN '쇼핑' WHEN BusinessType in ('숙박업', '레저업소', '레저용품', '여행') THEN '여행' WHEN BusinessType in ('서적문구', '학원') THEN '교육' WHEN BusinessType in ('기타의료기관', '병원', '보건위생', '의원', '약국') THEN '의료' WHEN BusinessType in ('문화취미') THEN '문화/취미' WHEN BusinessType in ('수리서비스', '용역서비스', '자동차', '정비유지') THEN '서비스' WHEN BusinessType in ('음료식품', '건강식품', '일반휴게음식', '농업') THEN '음식' WHEN BusinessType in ('유통업', '영리', '유통업', '비영리') THEN '유통업' ELSE '기타 ' END) as 'BusinessType', sum(TotalPayment) as'TotalPayment' FROM TP_MWMN_ACCTO_CNSMP_PTTRN GROUP BY Sex, BusinessType) a GROUP BY Sex, BusinessType HAVING Sex = ${sex};
